text: One day in June the grass said to the shadow of an elm, "You move so often from right to left that you disturb my peace. - I don't, I don't, "the shadow said. Look up to the sky. You'll see a tree moving by the east-west wind between the sun and the earth. And the grass looked up and for the first time looked at the tree. And he said in his heart, Why is there a higher grass than I? Then he was silent. FIN
title: La sombra
author: Gibrán Jalil Gibrán
